trans-unit.source: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> is expected in the control's <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項可以處於特定狀態且<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>預期在控制項的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Control authors use this attribute to specify the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects that belong in their control's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 控制項作者會使用這個屬性，指定<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>並<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>在其控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>隸屬的物件</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup></xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> named `FocusStates`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您建立新的控制項有兩個名為的視覺狀態`Focused`和`Unfocused`，這是中的<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>名為`FocusStates`。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: To specify to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> authors that they can use those visual states, add two TemplateVisualStateAttribute attributes to the class signature of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>作者可以使用這些視覺狀態將兩個 TemplateVisualStateAttribute 屬性加入至控制項的類別簽章。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Specify that the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A> property is `FocusStates` and that the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A> property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A>屬性是`FocusStates`而且<xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A>屬性是`Focused`其中一個與`Unfocused`其他。</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.GroupName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the group that the state belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態所屬群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The GroupName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: GroupName 屬性會對應至<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>物件。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify what <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> belongs in, set the GroupName property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的項目<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup><xref:System.Windows.VisualState>所屬在中，設定 群組名稱屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualStateGroup"></xref> that the state belongs to.
Gets or sets the name of the state that the control can be in.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項可以處於狀態的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>.
To specify what <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> belongs in a control's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set the Name property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的項目<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>屬於控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，設定 Name 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: The name of the state that the control can be in.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以處於狀態的名稱。
